name: Summon
description:
You will have to be smart and resourceful to find ways to escape from the "uninvited guest" who for some reason started knocking on your door.🤔

What is this game about?
You have the opportunity to play for the popular streamer Papich, known for his iconic meme phrases. But this time, during one of his streams, something unexpected happens - a mysterious mustachioed man in camouflage uniform starts knocking on the door to hand our hero a piece of paper with the inscription "Summons". It's time to do something.
The main genres of the game: puzzle, memes, action, simulator.

What is special about this game?
- Lots of story animations with famous meme personalities.
- More than 7 different types of puzzles.
- A ton of popular memes.
- The plot.
- Task execution system.
- A content-filled world.
- An opportunity to fight with haters.
- Capybaras.

The game is fiction and has nothing to do with reality, any coincidences with real events or personalities are absolutely random. The game features a fictional world. The game does not call anyone to anything, does not propagandize anything, and also does not aim to offend or humiliate anyone.
